channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Hub Device Client SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Hub Device Client SDK

item.title: CVE-2018-8531|2024-08-05T07:02:25.102Z -- microsoft -- hub%20device%20client%20sdk
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that Azure IoT Hub Device Client SDK using MQTT protocol accesses objects in memory, aka "Azure IoT Device Client SDK Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Hub Device Client SDK, Azure IoT Edge.
